attributes.action: Nothern Ireland Young Drivers Car Insurance Reduction
attributes.additional_details:
On average Northern Irish drivers aged 17-21 pay 50% more than those from the mainland UK, there are many reasons behind this, but they are all reasons which require investigation.

Sign this petition if you want to have Car Insurance in Northern Ireland for Young drivers investigated and reduced to a fair price, a Quote in Scotland (Glasgow) Will fetch a 17 year old male driver a quote of around £2200 but in Northern Ireland a 17 year old will be expected to pay around £4500, this difference is causing trouble for Northern Irish Society, being a mainly rural country, it is reducing access to jobs within Northern Ireland and preventing the progress of the countries younger generation as a whole
